projects.title: Personal Portfolio Website
projects.description: A modern portfolio website built with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui components. Features dark mode support and responsive design.

projects.title: Task Manager Application
projects.description: A full-stack task management application with real-time updates, user authentication, and collaborative features.

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: A weather dashboard that provides real-time weather information, forecasts, and interactive maps using various weather APIs.
